comment: The circle method, where the Vinogradov sums are weighted using the Von Mangoldt function and smoothed using functions ` H ` and ` K ` . Statement 7.49 of [Helfgott] p. 69. At this point there is no further constraint on the smoothing functions. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Dec-2021.)
